tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audits (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    audit_date TIMESTAMP,
    script_name VARCHAR(255),
    access_pattern VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE auditing_security_policies (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    PolicyName VARCHAR(255),
    AccessPattern VARCHAR(255),
    ExecutionDateTime TIMESTAMP,
    Result VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    LogID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    PolicyID INT,
    UserID INT,
    ActionTaken VARCHAR(100),
    ExecutionDateTime TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT FK_Policy FOREIGN KEY (PolicyID) REFERENCES auditing_security_policies(ID)
)

CREATE TABLE Auditing_Security_Policies_Compliance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    script_name VARCHAR(255),
    access_pattern TEXT,
    audit_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    script_name VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  script_id INT REFERENCES sql_scripts(script_id),
  pattern_id INT REFERENCES access_patterns(pattern_id),
  policy_id INT REFERENCES auditing_policies(policy_id),
  analysis_result TEXT
);
